profileType.title: Profile Type
profileType.description: Select the Uber rides you want to collect. Either PERSONAL, BUSINESS or FAMILY.

getDocuments.script:
fetch('https://riders.uber.com/graphql', {
  headers: { 'content-type': 'application/json', 'x-csrf-token': 'x' },
  referrerPolicy: 'strict-origin-when-cross-origin',
  body: '{"operationName":"Activities","variables":{"includePast":true,"includeUpcoming":false,"limit":100,"orderTypes":["RIDES","TRAVEL"],"profileType":"{{config.profileType}}","cityID":330},"query":"query Activities($cityID: Int, $endTimeMs: Float, $includePast: Boolean = true, $includeUpcoming: Boolean = true, $limit: Int = 5, $nextPageToken: String, $orderTypes: [RVWebCommonActivityOrderType!] = [RIDES, TRAVEL], $profileType: RVWebCommonActivityProfileType = PERSONAL, $startTimeMs: Float) {\\n  activities(cityID: $cityID) {\\n    cityID\\n    past(\\n      endTimeMs: $endTimeMs\\n      limit: $limit\\n      nextPageToken: $nextPageToken\\n      orderTypes: $orderTypes\\n      profileType: $profileType\\n      startTimeMs: $startTimeMs\\n    ) @include(if: $includePast) {\\n      activities {\\n        ...RVWebCommonActivityFragment\\n        __typename\\n      }\\n      nextPageToken\\n      __typename\\n    }\\n    upcoming @include(if: $includeUpcoming) {\\n      activities {\\n        ...RVWebCommonActivityFragment\\n        __typename\\n      }\\n      __typename\\n    }\\n    __typename\\n  }\\n}\\n\\nfragment RVWebCommonActivityFragment on RVWebCommonActivity {\\n  cardURL\\n  description\\n  subtitle\\n  title\\n  uuid\\n  __typename\\n}"}',
  method: 'POST',
  mode: 'cors',
  credentials: 'include',
})
  .then((res) => res.json())
  .then((d) => d.data.activities.past.activities)
